name: creed
description: Sophisticated and functionally-minded async with advanced features: coroutines, promises, ES2015 iterables, fantasy-land
author: brian@hovercraftstudios.com

scripts.compile: npm run compile-src && npm run compile-test
scripts.compile-src: mkdirp build/src && buble -m -i src -o build/src --no modules
scripts.compile-test: mkdirp build/test && buble -m -i test -o build/test --no modules,generator --target node:4
scripts.build-dist: npm run compile && mkdirp dist && rollup -c
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && uglifyjs -c 'warnings=false' -m -o dist/creed.min.js -- dist/creed.js
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run build
